articles.content: Every year, the Oscar nomination announcements tend to inspire shrieks of joy, yelps of surprise, and the loud gnashing of teeth and rending of garments. This year was no different, with gasps soundt… [+11107 chars]

articles.title: Rosalía Rocked a Comfy Cropped Sweater to the Billboard Women in Music Awards - Cosmopolitan
articles.description: Welcome to our new March 2023 aesthetic.
articles.content: Rosalía showed up to the Billboard Women in Music Awards last night, where she received the inaugural Women in Music Producer of the Year award (!!!!!). And of course, her outfit was simply perfectio… [+1285 chars]
